CustomField.description: This is used to determine if there are records of any incident and what type of records they may have. This is to remove the need for a Yes or No for any and every type of documentation they may have or require for a case. So we can provide options to show "medical and accident" records or "medical only" etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Records the client has of documentation of incidences and/or treatment
CustomField.label: Documentation of Records
